level.text: A foster parent shall maintain the confidentiality of all information about a foster child and the foster child’s family. A foster parent may transmit information about a foster child or the foster child’s family only in accordance with District law:
To the agency and its representatives;
The foster child’s parent pursuant to ยง 6002.2(c);
To the foster child’s guardian ad litem;
As authorized by CFSA or the agency in order to provide services to the foster child and in accordance with ยง 6023;
As necessary for the provision of medical, mental health, or educational services; and
In accordance with a court order.
